SELECT -- JOURNAL 테이블 컬럼들 j.JNL_NUM, j.JNL_TITLE, j.MEMBER_NUM, j.JNL_VIEWS, j.JNL_MEMO, j.JNL_CREATE_DATE, j.JNL_UPDATE_DATE, j.JNL_PERIOD, j.JNL_TAG, j.JNL_THEME, j.JNL_AREA,
-- MEMBER 및 MEMBER_IMGS 테이블의 정보 m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, mi.MEMBER_IMG_URL, mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID, mi.MEMBER_IMGS_GUID, mi.FILE_NAME AS MEMBER_IMG_FILE_NAME, mi.UPLOADPATH AS MEMBER_IMG_UPLOADPATH,
-- JOURNAL_DAY 테이블 컬럼들 jd.JNL_NUM, jd.JNL_DAY, jd.JNL_PLACE_ORDER, jd.JNL_CONTENTS,
-- JNL_IMGS 테이블 컬럼들 ji.FILE_NAME AS JNL_IMG_FILE_NAME, ji.JNL_IMGS_GUID, ji.UPLOADPATH AS JNL_IMG_UPLOADPATH, ji.JNL_IMGS_ORDER
FROM JOURNAL j JOIN MEMBER m ON j.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMGS mi ON m.MEMBER_IMGS_ID = mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID LEFT JOIN JNL_DAY jd ON j.JNL_NUM = jd.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS ji ON jd.JNL_NUM = ji.JNL_NUM AND jd.JNL_DAY = ji.JNL_DAY WHERE j.JNL_NUM = #{jnlNum}
SELECT jd.JNL_NUM, jd.JNL_DAY, jd.JNL_PLACE_ORDER, jd.JNL_CONTENTS, FROM JOURNAL_DAY jd WHERE jd.JNL_NUM = #{journalNum} ORDER BY jd.JNL_DAY

-- MEMBER_IMGS 테이블의 정보 mi.MEMBER_IMG_URL, mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID, mi.MEMBER_IMGS_GUID, mi.FILE_NAME AS MEMBER_IMG_FILE_NAME, mi.UPLOADPATH AS MEMBER_IMG_UPLOADPATH,
-- JOURNAL_DAY 테이블 컬럼들 jd.JNL_DAY, jd.JNL_PLACE_ORDER, jd.JNL_CONTENTS,
-- JNL_IMGS 테이블 컬럼들 ji.FILE_NAME AS JNL_IMG_FILE_NAME, ji.JNL_IMGS_GUID, ji.UPLOADPATH AS JNL_IMG_UPLOADPATH, ji.JNL_IMGS_ORDER
FROM JOURNAL j JOIN MEMBER m ON j.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMGS mi ON m.MEMBER_IMGS_ID = mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID LEFT JOIN JNL_DAY jd ON j.JNL_NUM = jd.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS ji ON jd.JNL_NUM = ji.JNL_NUM AND jd.JNL_DAY = ji.JNL_DAY WHERE j.JNL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR j.JNL_AREA LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR j.JNL_TAG LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR j.JNL_THEME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR j.JNL_PERIOD LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY j.JNL_CREATE_DATE DESC

-- JNL_IMGS 테이블 컬럼들 ji.FILE_NAME AS JNL_IMG_FILE_NAME, ji.JNL_IMGS_GUID, ji.UPLOADPATH AS JNL_IMG_UPLOADPATH, ji.JNL_IMGS_ORDER
FROM JOURNAL j JOIN MEMBER m ON j.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMGS mi ON m.MEMBER_IMGS_ID = mi.MEMBER_IMGS_ID LEFT JOIN JNL_DAY jd ON j.JNL_NUM = jd.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS ji ON jd.JNL_NUM = ji.JNL_NUM AND jd.JNL_DAY = ji.JNL_DAY WHERE j.JNL_AREA LIKE '%' || #{area} || '%' ORDER BY j.JNL_CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT j.*, i.* FROM JOURNAL j LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS i ON j.JNL_NUM = i.JNL_NUM ORDER BY j.JNL_CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT JNL_NUM, JNL_TITLE FROM JOURNAL ORDER BY JNL_VIEWS DESC
SELECT j.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOURNAL_PICK jp WHERE jp.JNL_NUM = j.JNL_NUM) AS pick_count FROM JOURNAL j ORDER BY pick_count DESC
SELECT j.*, i.* FROM JOURNAL j JOIN TEMPLATE t ON j.JNL_NUM = t.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN JNL_IMGS i ON j.JNL_NUM = i.JNL_NUM ORDER BY j.JNL_CREATE_DATE DESC
